InstructionData.Instructions:
### Hydroponic Farming Script ### alias Self db alias GrowthState r0 # Growth state from Hydroponic alias HarvieActivateState r1 alias Temp r2
define HydroponicsHash HASH("StructureHydroponicsTrayData") define HarvieHash HASH("StructureHarvie")
define Group1 HASH("Group 1")
define HydroSlotPlant 0 # Hydroponic "Plant" slot index # Growth parameter is "Growth"
# Harvie "Activate" states: # 0 = Idle # 1 = Planting # 2 = Harvesting
# Growth State from Hydro slot can be: # -1: Empty # 0..4: Growing / Mature # 5: Seeding
Main: yield jal HandleFarming j Main
HandleFarming: lbns GrowthState HydroponicsHash Group1 HydroSlotPlant Growth Maximum s Self Setting GrowthState beq GrowthState -1 DoPlant beq GrowthState 5 DoHarvest j FarmingDone
DoPlant: sbn HarvieHash Group1 Plant 1 j FarmingDone
DoHarvest: sbn HarvieHash Group1 Harvest 1 j FarmingDone
FarmingDone: sleep 5 j ra
